class.name: minestar.production.domain.orepass.OrePassTimeLineRecord
class.meta: A historical record of when the operating status of an ore pass changed.

many-to-one.name: orePass
many-to-one.meta: A reference to the ore pass (MSMODEL.ORE_PASS) that this record applies to.

property.name: status
property.meta: The reason of the operating status that the ore pass changed to.

property.name: statusOID
property.meta: The OID of the operating status that the ore pass changed to.

property.name: hungUp
property.meta: Whether the new operating status represents a hung up ore pass. (This flag is '1' if it represents a hung up ore pass and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: closed
property.meta: Whether the new operating status represents a closed ore pass. (This flag is '1' if it represents a closed ore pass and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: oldStatus
property.meta: The reason of the previous operating status that the ore pass changed from.

property.name: oldStatusOID
property.meta: The OID of the previous operating status that the ore pass changed from.

property.name: oldHungUp
property.meta: Whether the previous operating status represents a hung up ore pass. (This flag is '1' if it represents a hung up ore pass and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: oldClosed
property.meta: Whether the previous operating status represents a closed ore pass. (This flag is '1' if it represents a closed ore pass and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: changeDate
property.meta: The timestamp when the ore pass's operating status change occurred.
The UTC timestamp of when the ore pass's operating status change occurred.
